description: This file defines API endpoints for managing tasks in a task management system. It uses FastAPI to declare routes for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, deleting, assigning, and updating the status of tasks, with placeholder implementations pending database logic.

methods.name: create_task( task_in: TaskCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
methods.description: Handles the creation of a new task via POST request.

methods.name: list_tasks( status: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by status"), assignee_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by assignee id"), due_before: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="Tasks due before this date"), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
methods.description: Handles listing tasks with optional filtering via GET request.

methods.name: get_task( task_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
methods.description: Retrieves a specific task by ID via GET request.

methods.name: update_task( task_id: int, task_in: TaskUpdate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
methods.description: Updates an existing task by ID via PUT request.

methods.name: delete_task( task_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
methods.description: Deletes a task by ID via DELETE request.

methods.name: assign_task( task_id: int, assignee_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
methods.description: Assigns a task to a user via POST request.

methods.name: update_status( task_id: int, new_status: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
methods.description: Updates the status of a task via POST request.

methods.name: get_due_today( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
methods.description: Retrieves tasks due today via GET request.

ctags.name: assign_task
ctags.signature: ( task_id: int, assignee_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )

ctags.name: list_tasks
ctags.signature: ( status: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by status"), assignee_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by assignee id"), due_before: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="Tasks due before this date"), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )

ctags.name: update_status
ctags.signature: ( task_id: int, new_status: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )

ctags.name: update_task
ctags.signature: ( task_id: int, task_in: TaskUpdate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db_session) )
